description: Image generation, editing, and upscaling using Stability AI's API.

connections.stdioFunction: config => ({ command: 'npx', args: ['-y', 'mcp-server-stability-ai'], env: { STABILITY_AI_API_KEY: config.stabilityAiApiKey, IMAGE_STORAGE_DIRECTORY: config.imageStorageDirectory } })

stabilityAiApiKey.description: Your Stability AI API key. Get one at https://platform.stability.ai/account/keys

imageStorageDirectory.description: Directory where generated images will be saved, e.g., '/Users/admin/Downloads/stability-ai-images'.
